name: Firefighter Truck Simulator 3D
description:
It's time to take some off from the crazy driving games and serve humanity by becoming the town fireman rescue hero. Get ready to start your fire rescue career in this new firefighter truck simulator. Drive carefully to avoid road accidents with city traffic and passenger vehicles due to over speed. Abandon firefighting site with rescue barriers and start throwing water to stop fire burns asap. Then search for injured and burn casualties and transfer them to nearby burn care hospital. Extinguish fire quickly to avoid more fire casualties. Be the fireman rescue hero in this fire emergency simulator.

Deal with dangerous situations in this American firefighter truck driving game. You can opt for firefighting training before starting the rescue missions. Drive fire trucks with extreme precision and save innocent citizens. Make use of ladder truck in case of long multi-story buildings. Save yourself from hot flames and be the famous emergency rescue driver.

Features:

- Serve humanity by becoming the town fireman rescue hero
- New firefighter truck simulator
- Drive water tanker and firefighter truck to the emergency location
- Ensure rescue 911 emergency responding duties at fire stations
- Abandon firefighting site with rescue barriers
- Enable throwing water to stop fire burns
- Transfer burn casualties to nearby burn care hospital
- Extinguish fire quickly to avoid more fire casualties
- Become fireman rescue hero in this fire emergency simulator
- Save yourself from hot flames
- Be the famous emergency rescue driver.
